# Get input
N = int(input())
T_list = list(map(int, input().split()))
M = int(input())
PX_list = [list(map(int, input().split())) for i in range(M)]

# Solve
for i in range(M):
    P, X = PX_list[i]
    T_list[P-1] = X
    print(sum(T_list))

# Get input
N = int(input())
T_list = list(map(int, input().split()))
M = int(input())
PX_list = [list(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(M)]

# Solve
for i in range(M):
    P, X = PX_list[i]
    T_list[P-1] = X
    print(sum(T_list))

# Get input
N = int(input())
T_list = list(map(int, input().split()))
M = int(input())
PX_list = [list(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(M)]

# Solve
for P, X in PX_list:
    T_list[P - 1] = X
    print(sum(T_list)) 

N = int(input())
T = list(map(int, input().split()))
M = int(input())
P_X = [list(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(M)]

for i in range(M):
    P, X = P_X[i]
    print(sum(T) - T[P-1] + X)

N = int(input())
T = list(map(int, input().split()))
M = int(input())
P_X = [list(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(M)]

for i in range(M):
    P, X = P_X[i]
    print(sum(T) - T[P - 1] + X)
